name: Slardar
title: Slithereen Guard
lore: Guardian of the deep, Slardar crushes his enemies with raw strength and reveals hidden foes.

guardianSprint.name: Guardian Sprint
guardianSprint.description: Slardar moves at maximum speed but takes bonus damage while active.

slithereenCrush.name: Slithereen Crush
slithereenCrush.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

bashOfTheDeep.name: Bash of the Deep
bashOfTheDeep.description: Grants a chance to bash enemies, stunning and dealing bonus damage.

corrosiveHaze.name: Corrosive Haze
corrosiveHaze.description: Reveals an enemy and reduces their armor significantly.
